+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Markdown syntax                                                           |            | Output                                                                                     |

| ``` markdown                                                              |            | *italics*, **bold**, ***bold italics***                                                    |
| *italics*, **bold**, ***bold italics***                                   |            |                                                                                            |
| ```                                                                       |            |                                                                                            |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ``` markdown                                                              |            | superscript^2^ / subscript~2~                                                              |
| superscript^2^ / subscript~2~                                             |            |                                                                                            |
| ```                                                                       |            |                                                                                            |

| ``` markdown                                                              |            | ~~strikethrough~~                                                                          |
| ~~strikethrough~~                                                         |            |                                                                                            |
| ```                                                                       |            |                                                                                            |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ``` markdown                                                              |            | `code`                                                                                     |

| ```                                                                       |            |                                                                                            |

| - Item 3                                                                  |            |                                                                                            |
| ```                                                                       |            |                                                                                            |
